data.what_is:
With LianaAutomation, you can transform customer data into bite-sized portions and timely actions. Find out what your customers really need - and rush in when they show interest by approaching them with well-targeted marketing messages in multiple channels. The platform is scalable - suitable for small businesses, medium-sized enterprises, as well as B2B and B2C sectors.

Some of the key features:

-Pull data from other marketing platforms, CRM systems, or your website
-Automate content on various platforms
-Personalize WordPress site with
-Automate communications
-Automate personalized campaigns
data.product_description: With Liana(r)Cloud Marketing Automation platform, you can transform your customer data into bite-sized portions and timely actions. pricing_plans.plan_description: An easy way to start marketing automation.
Agile and easy-to-use solution for data-driven marketing automation in multiple channels.
Multichannel marketing automation for heavy user and multiple data channel with custom integrations.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Liana(r)Cloud Marketing Automation?
I like that it brings everything together under an easy-to-read and understand umbrella. As someone with little sales experience, Liana made most pieces of information I needed just a click away.

What do you dislike about Liana(r)Cloud Marketing Automation?
It was more of an error on our system side, but the integration process took some time. However, the Liana support team was there with us every step of the way.

What problems is Liana(r)Cloud Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
The real-time updating was huge for us. We could see at an instant which accounts required what kind of attention and were able to streamline our efforts into maximum productivity.
